amendment.description: Amendment eliminates all travel funds for the Department of Housing and Urban Development.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part A of House Report 111-578 to eliminate all travel funds for the Department of Housing and Urban Development.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Kaptur.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
